import React, {useRef, useState} from 'react' import {Link, useHistory} from "react-router-dom"; import {BsFacebook, BsTwitter, BsLinkedin} from "react-icons/bs"; import {useAuth} from "./contexts/AuthContext"; import {Alert} from "react-bootstrap" function Login() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const {signup} = useAuth() const [error, setError] = useState('') const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) //const history = useHistory() async function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() try { await signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) //history.push("/") } catch { setError('Failed to create an account') } setLoading(false) } return (
Sign up with

) } export default Login
